content: i designed this puppy via my domestika how to knit a puppy course i changed the body and head shape slightly but the basics are still similar if you want to be taught in your own time how to knit it in the course you ll learn my finishing techniques and all important shaping techniques and for you there s a 15% discount with the code claire_garland-discount - tap the link below to learn more ⬇️ https //www domestika org/en/courses/2611-knitting-realistic-stuffed-animals-make-a-puppy-from-yarn/claire_garland 1 1 https //www domestika org/en/courses/2611-knitting-realistic-stuffed-animals-make-a-puppy-from-yarn/claire_garland
